Package jam.plot

Classes for controlling the representation of the plots portion of Jam's display.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ColorScale  
Displayable Interface for a object that can be displayed
PlotMouseListener Interface that you must implement if you want to get mouse click data point.
 

Class Summary
Action Class the does the actions on plots.
BoundedRangeModelX Scroller contains instance of this, and it is be handed to the horizontal JScrollBar.
BoundedRangeModelY Scroller contains instance of this, and it is be handed to the vertical JScrollBar.
Display This class is a display routine for plots.
Display.Preferences for preference black background
Limits Stores the parameters on how the histograms are to be displayed.
Plot Abstract class for displayed plots.
PlotMouse Converts screen pixel to data value for a mouse Click.
 

Package jam.plot Description

Classes for controlling the representation of the plots portion of Jam's display.
